text: Amityville Death House is a 2015 direct-to-video horror film. The film is based on the 1977 novel The Amityville Horror. The film follows the trend of films based on The Amityville Horror having little to nothing to do with the events in the book and only using the location, the DeFeo murders and the 112 Ocean Avenue house as a plot point. The film was directed by Mark Polonia, one of the Polonia brothers.
